{"step_by_step_thinking": "In resource-limited settings, maintaining HIV viral load suppression over time can be challenging due to various factors. However, there are several strategies that can be implemented to improve the feasibility of treatment as prevention. These include ensuring access to antiretroviral therapy (ART) for all individuals living with HIV, providing regular monitoring and support for medication adherence, and addressing barriers to healthcare access. Additionally, community-based interventions and education programs can play a crucial role in promoting viral load suppression. Taking all these factors into consideration, the answer is A. yes, it is feasible to maintain HIV viral load suppression over time in resource-limited settings.", "answer_choice": "A"}
